content.question: Which of the following is a likely outcome of gerrymandering?

choices.label: Splitting areas of majority group voters across a number of legislative representatives' districts
Packing areas of minority group voters into a single legislative representative’s district
Disrupting electronic polling machines or the data networks run by elections officials
Placing a legislative representative’s districts in a row pattern while drawing a new electoral map
Supporting political party candidates with campaign funds intended to be used in particular geographic areas

content.answer: Packing areas of minority group voters into a single legislative representative’s district

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
